claim.text: Incorporating contrastive learning into MLLMs not only reduces the occurrence of hallucinations but also improves the performance across multiple benchmark evaluations.
claim.exact_quote: Our experiments also show that equipping MLLMs with HACL not only reduces the occurrence of hallucinations but also effectively improve the performance across multiple benchmark evaluations.

evidence.evidence_text: Our experiments also show that equipping MLLMs with HACL not only reduces the occurrence of hallucinations but also effectively improve the performance across multiple benchmark evaluations.
evidence.exact_quote: Our experiments also show that equipping MLLMs with HACL not only reduces the occurrence of hallucinations but also effectively improve the performance across multiple benchmark evaluations.

claim.text: Our proposed method significantly enhances the alignment between visual and textual representations in MLLMs.
claim.exact_quote: Our proposed method significantly enhances the alignment between visual and textual representations in MLLMs.

evidence.evidence_text: Our proposed method significantly enhances the alignment between visual and textual representations in MLLMs.
evidence.exact_quote: Our proposed method significantly enhances the alignment between visual and textual representations in MLLMs.

claim.text: In our study, LLaVA-HACL achieved a 29% increase in overall score on the MMhal-Bench benchmark and an 11% improvement on the MME benchmark.
claim.exact_quote: In conclusion, this paper makes the following contributions: As shown in Subfigure 1 (c), when equipped with HACL, LLaVA achieves a 29% increase in overall score on the MMhal-Bench benchmark and an 11% improvement on the MME benchmark.

evidence.evidence_text: As shown in Subfigure 1 (c), when equipped with HACL, LLaVA achieves a 29% increase in overall score on the MMhal-Bench benchmark and an 11% improvement on the MME benchmark.
evidence.exact_quote: As shown in Subfigure 1 (c), when equipped with HACL, LLaVA achieves a 29% increase in overall score on the MMhal-Bench benchmark and an 11% improvement on the MME benchmark.
